author: Tomas Ricciardi
description: Tomas’ inspiration: “El Bohemio - a bohemian - is a free-thinking individual who does not care what other people think. This brought me back to the origins of BACARDÍ rum, with Don Facundo Bacardí Masso’s radical new way of producing rum, and with my own heritage from the Czech Republic, otherwise known as Bohemia. My legacy is to honor the free thinkers who are not afraid to go in their own direction and to support the creatives who do not fear the reaction of others - for this is the true bohemian mindset.”
name: El Bohemio
recipeIngredient: 10 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass
